entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
